summary: Jamie Morgan, a young man with a large heart-shaped birthmark on his face, discovers that there are demons on the streets of East London.
cast: Jim Sturgess|Luke Treadaway|Clémence Poésy|Justin Salinger|Fraser Ayres|Noel Clarke|Ruth Sheen|Dave Florez|Nikita Mistry|Timothy Spall|Connie Hyde|Nadia Theaker|David Sibley|Imogen Church|Joseph Mawle|Eddie Marsan|Jack Gordon|John Macmillan|Ross McCart|Edward Green|James Lamb|Matt Ingram|Randell Benain|Shaya Raymond|Charlie Dupré|Rishi Doshi|James Mustoe|Bhasker Patel|Andrew Pritchard|Sarah-Jane Sherwood|Nicholas Tennant
title: Heartless
